attributes.action: Improve Hospital catering to include a balanced diet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hospital food should have a choice of menu items to suit all tastes and should provide a properly balanced diet.
It should also be served at a reasonable temp. rather than luke warm & unrecognisable. It should be a joy to eat. Then people would be less likely to leave having lost weight. It would also cut down on waste and the need for drugs to help with problems of malnutrition.
